triples.name: Random forest
triples.relevance: The paper implements and presents the random forest algorithm, a fundamental ensemble learning method.

triples.name: Statistical learning theory
triples.relevance: The paper frames random forests within the statistical learning theory framework.

triples.name: Statistical classification
triples.relevance: The paper demonstrates classification applications including credit card default prediction.

triples.name: Regression analysis
triples.relevance: The paper demonstrates regression applications including predicting news article shares.

triples.name: Supervised learning
triples.relevance: Random forests are used for supervised learning tasks in both classification and regression examples.

triples.name: Statistical software
triples.relevance: The paper introduces the rforest command, a new statistical software tool for implementing random forests.
